executable.title: CODEX Feature Extraction
executable.description: Calculate channel-level statistics for nuclei in a CODEX image. Used for cell-level classification
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of efforts in digital pathology by the Sarder Lab: UFL.

integer.name: threshold_nuclei
integer.label: Threshold for Nuclei
integer.description: Pixel intensity threshold for nuclear subcompartment

parameters.label: Girder API URL and Key
parameters.description: A Girder API URL and token for Girder client

string.name: girderToken
string.label: Girder API Token
string.description: A Girder token identifying a user session

string.name: featureCats
string.label: Types of Features
string.description: Types of morphometric features to include (comma separated list, remove features that aren't desired, replace spaces with underscores)
string.default: Distance Transform Features,Color Features,Texture Features,Morphological Features

string.name: ignoreAnns
string.label: Ignore Annotations
string.description: Specify annotation names to ignore (spots and interstitium are automatically skipped, comma separated list)

boolean.name: returnXlsx
boolean.label: Return Excel File(s)
boolean.description: Whether or not to output excel files containing morphometric features (must also specify path)

directory.name: outputPath
directory.label: Excel File(s) Output Path
directory.description: Base path where morphometric files are saved to (if specified in previous parameter)
